phdl.parser
Class SubDesignDeclaration

java.lang.Object
  phdl.parser.Element
      phdl.parser.Declaration
          phdl.parser.ArrayDeclaration
              phdl.parser.InstanceDeclarations
                  phdl.parser.SubDesignDeclaration

public class SubDesignDeclaration
extends InstanceDeclarations

A class that represents a sub-design declaration in phdl. A sub-design declaration (of a design) has a set of ports.

Author:
Richard Black and Brad Riching
